item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“str2own99, post:2, topic:372229”] public void welcomeScreen() { sendQuest("Title goes here", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("put in here w/e u want it to be", 8147); sendQuest("like welcome to Strscape", 8148); sendQuest("Information Text", 8149); sendQuest("Information Text", 8150); sendQuest("Information Text", 8151); sendQuest("Information Text", 8152); sendQuest("Information Text", 8153); sendQuest("Information Text", 8154); sendQuest("Information Text", 8155); sendQuestSomething(368); showInterface(368); flushOutStream(); }

How do i edit the text?[/quote]
[/quote]

I ibviously would have tried that, it doesnt work

item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

public void welcomeScreen() {
        sendQuest("Title goes here", 8144);
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("put in here w/e u want it to be", 8147);
        sendQuest("like welcome to Strscape", 8148);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8149);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8150);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8151);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8152);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8153);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8154);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8155);
        sendQuestSomething(368);
        showInterface(368);
        flushOutStream();
}

How do i edit the text?
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Delta base.

Ive got this code:

public void welcomeScreen() {
        sendQuest("Title", 8144);
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8147);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8148);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8149);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8150);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8151);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8152);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8153);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8154);
        sendQuest("Information Text", 8155);
        sendQuestSomething(368);
        showInterface(368);
        flushOutStream();
}

How do i edit the text?
